text: Joseph Adam Jonas (born August 15, 1989) is an American singer-songwriter, and actor. He became known as a member of the pop rock band the Jonas Brothers, alongside his brothers Kevin and Nick. He starred in Camp Rock (2008) and its sequel Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam (2010) as well as two television series, Jonas Brothers: Living the Dream (2008–2010) and Jonas (2009–2010). After the Jonas Brothers officially split-up, Jonas formed the funk-pop band DNCE in 2015. The group became well known for their debut single "Cake by the Ocean", which peaked at number 9 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United States. In 2019, he married English actress Sophie Turner and they have two daughters together. On September 5, 2023, Jonas filed for divorce from Turner. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American pop singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American rock singers Category:American pianists Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pop musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American funk singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from Arizona Category:Writers from Arizona Category:Musicians from Arizona Category:Actors from Arizona Category:Singers from New Jersey Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Wyckoff, New Jersey Category:Jonas Brothers members
title: Joe Jonas
